publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-637# Patrick Harvie: Ministerial Boycott of World Peace Debateâ€”That the Parliament deplores the decision by the Scottish Executive to boycott the debate on world peace and considers that Executive ministers should take part in every Parliamentary debate. Supported by: Campbell Martin*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Chris Ballance*, Richard Lochhead*, Tommy Sheridan*, Carolyn Leckie*, Christine Grahame*, Rosie Kane*, Frances Curran*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Mark Ballard*, Shiona Baird*, Rob Gibson*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Linda Fabiani*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*

S2M-637# Patrick Harvie: Ministerial Boycott of World Peace Debate-That the Parliament deplores the decision by the Scottish Executive to boycott the debate on world peace and considers that Executive ministers should take part in every Parliamentary debate. Supported by: Campbell Martin, Nicola Sturgeon, Chris Ballance, Richard Lochhead, Tommy Sheridan, Carolyn Leckie, Christine Grahame, Rosie Kane, Frances Curran, Mr Mark Ruskell, Mark Ballard, Shiona Baird, Rob Gibson, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Linda Fabiani, Eleanor Scott, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Colin Fox*, Margo MacDonald*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-637# Ministerial Boycott of World Peace Debate (lodged on 20 November 2003) Robin Harper*
S2M-637# Ministerial Boycott of World Peace Debate (lodged on 20 November 2003) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-637# Ministerial Boycott of World Peace Debate (lodged on 20 November 2003) Alasdair Morgan*
S2M-637# Ministerial Boycott of World Peace Debate (lodged on 20 November 2003) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-637# Ministerial Boycott of World Peace Debate (lodged on 20 November 2003) Brian Adam*
